items: I'm a fullstack TypeScript software engineer with 5 years of experience specializing in building custom APIs, scalable cloud-native applications, and modern, accessible web interfaces using industry-standard stacks like NestJS, Next.js, and Supabase.

I design clean solutions with performance and user experience in mind, favoring modular and documented architectures. My expertise ensures that every project meets the highest standards of performance, security, and code quality.
